Stormlight archives based 2D adventure placed in roschar where you are a skybreaker during the desolation and you have to lead an army to fight the sawnsingers. Make sure to add random events like high storms and beting attacked by chasmfiends. Also make it possible to use shadesmar for fast travel across the roschar map. Make it possible to collect multipe spree <clipped message>
Make sure everything is in a single HTML file with embedded CSS and JS in a single code block to be used as a web app.
